targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  component AS metric,
  utilisation
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'cpu' AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  component AS metric,
  utilisation
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'ram' AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  verification
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  hostname
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  account_credit AS "Account credit"
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  reliability
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  component AS metric,
  utilisation
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'disk_space' AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(time,1s),
  sum(power_consumption) + $power_offset AS "power_consumption"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__unixEpochGroup(time,1s)

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  FROM_UNIXTIME(end_date)
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  machine_id = $machine_id

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earn_hour * 0.75 AS "earn_hour"
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(time,1s),
  (((sum(power_consumption) + $power_offset) / 1000) * $power_cost) * ((($__to - $__from) / 1000) / 60 / 60)  AS "Power Cost      "
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) and
  machine_id = $machine_id
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__unixEpochGroup(time,1s)

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(time,1s),
  ((sum(power_consumption) + $power_offset) / 1000) * $power_cost AS "Avg. Power cost p/h"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
  and machine_id = $machine_id
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__unixEpochGroup(time,1s)

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  rentals_bid AS "Interruptible",
  rentals_on_demand AS "On Demand",
  rentals_stored AS "Stored"
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  count(*) as "Idle GPUs"
FROM instance
WHERE earning = '0' AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time desc
limit 1

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earn_day * 0.75 AS "earn_day"
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  temperature AS "GPU 0"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 0 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  temperature AS "GPU 1"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 1 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  temperature AS "GPU 2"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 2 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  temperature AS "GPU 3"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 3 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  reliability
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
   abs ( ( utilisation - LAG(utilisation,5) OVER ( PARTITION BY machine_id ORDER BY time) ) / 
   (  time - LAG(time,5) OVER (PARTITION BY machine_id ORDER BY time) ) ) time_usage
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'network' AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "CPU"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'cpu' AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 0"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 0 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 1"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 1 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 2"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 2 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 3"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 3 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 4"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 4 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 5"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 5 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 6"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 6 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 7"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 7 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
   abs ( ( utilisation - LAG(utilisation,5) OVER ( PARTITION BY machine_id ORDER BY time) ) / 
   (  time - LAG(time,5) OVER (PARTITION BY machine_id ORDER BY time) ) ) time_usage
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'network' AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 1"
FROM instance
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  instance_id = 1 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 2"
FROM instance
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  instance_id = 2 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 3"
FROM instance
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  instance_id = 3 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 4"
FROM instance
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  instance_id = 4 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 5"
FROM instance
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  instance_id = 5 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 0"
FROM instance
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  instance_id = 0 AND
  machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  name,
  val1 AS "Container ID",
  val2 AS "Image name",
  val3 AS "GPU ID(s)"
FROM event
where machine_id = $machine_id
ORDER BY time desc

list.definition:
SELECT
  machine_id
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time
list.label: Machine ID
list.name: machine_id
list.query:
SELECT
  machine_id
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time
